_metadata.note: WHALE TARGETS - one yes = multiple locations. Greystar requires NetVendor certification per Skool.
_metadata.apollo_status: API blocked on free plan - emails derived from company domain patterns (first.last@domain.com)
_metadata.why_pm_companies: One relationship = access to 10-50+ properties. Centralized decision making. Portfolio managers control multiple locations.

leads.name: Stephanie Bressler
leads.title: Senior Director of Real Estate
leads.notes: Senior Director level - high decision-making authority. Greystar REQUIRES NetVendor certification for vendor approval. Apply at netvendor.com BEFORE reaching out.
leads.approach: NetVendor application first, then LinkedIn connect, then gift basket drop-off

leads.name: Laura Dobslaw-Heetland
leads.title: Regional VP / CPM (Certified Property Manager)
leads.notes: Posts about hiring regional PMs for Greystar Nevada team - likely Regional VP. Active on LinkedIn. CPM certified. Very influential in Nevada operations.
leads.approach: NetVendor first, then LinkedIn warm connect with value prop

leads.name: Candice Barmore
leads.title: Regional Manager
leads.notes: Regional Manager in Las Vegas - direct authority over multiple properties. 860+ LinkedIn followers.
leads.approach: NetVendor first, then LinkedIn connect + pop-in to managed property

leads.name: Chris Smith
leads.title: Regional Manager
leads.notes: Experienced Regional Manager. Common name - email may need verification. North Las Vegas area.
leads.approach: NetVendor first, verify email, then outreach

leads.name: Jamie Miller
leads.title: Regional Property Manager
leads.notes: Regional Manager since Jan 2025. 12+ years at Greystar total (promoted from Community Manager). Deep company tenure = influence.
leads.approach: NetVendor first, then LinkedIn + in-person

leads.name: James Tirpak
leads.title: Senior Regional Property Manager
leads.notes: SENIOR Regional PM - oversees other PMs. 2.7K LinkedIn followers = very active networker. Worked with Director of Sales on outside sales. Key connector.
leads.approach: NetVendor first, then LinkedIn warm outreach

leads.name: Chris Annibali
leads.title: Regional Manager / Senior Leader
leads.notes: Penn State grad, Las Vegas based at Greystar. 400+ LinkedIn followers.
leads.approach: NetVendor first, then LinkedIn

leads.name: Rebecca Corey
leads.title: Vice President of Property Management
leads.notes: VP of Property Management at Las Vegas's LARGEST local PM company. THE decision-maker for amenities across 10K+ units. Family-owned (Molasky family). Ovation is 100% Las Vegas focused. ONE YES = massive placement opportunity.
leads.approach: Gift basket drop-off at corporate office, LinkedIn connect, then formal proposal

leads.name: Reinier Santana
leads.title: Chief Executive Officer
leads.notes: CEO - grew company from 2,000 to 10,000+ units. Oversees vision/strategy. May delegate to Rebecca Corey for PM decisions but useful C-suite contact.
leads.approach: LinkedIn executive connect, warm intro if possible

leads.name: Jess Molasky
leads.title: Principal and Chief Operating Officer
leads.notes: Molasky family member - founding family. COO with operational authority. Family decision = done deal.
leads.approach: Community event networking, Vegas Chamber connections

leads.name: Sarah Pruit
leads.title: Director of Marketing
leads.notes: Marketing Director - controls amenity messaging and resident experience marketing. Good ally for positioning smart markets as amenity upgrades.
leads.approach: Frame smart market as amenity/lifestyle upgrade in marketing pitch

leads.name: Deborah Stout
leads.title: Owner/CEO
leads.notes: Owner since 1989, tripled portfolio. Lifelong Las Vegas resident. Deep market relationships. Family business = personal decision authority.
leads.approach: Warm intro via NSAA (Nevada State Apartment Association) connections

leads.name: Taylor Stout
leads.title: President
leads.notes: President, former Portfolio Manager (understands operations). USC Marshall grad. Former NSAA President. Oversees strategic growth. Las Vegas native.
leads.approach: NSAA connection, USC alumni network, formal proposal

leads.name: Amy Sybilrud
leads.title: Regional Vice President
leads.notes: Started on-site in 2006, promoted to Senior Regional Manager then RVP. Runs employee training program. Deep operational knowledge = understands amenity value.
leads.approach: Pop-in at managed property, gift basket, build relationship

leads.name: Orly Shencher
leads.title: Director of Corporate Operations
leads.notes: Director of Corporate Ops - controls vendor approvals and operational decisions. Good internal champion if we land a pilot.
leads.approach: After connecting with Taylor/Amy, get intro to Orly for vendor onboarding

leads.name: Dave Chamberlin
leads.title: Owner
leads.notes: Owner - managed 60,000+ units over career. Company HQ in Phoenix but manages Nevada properties. Decision maker for multi-state portfolio.
leads.approach: Formal proposal highlighting Nevada locations, ROI data

leads.name: Matthew McGee
leads.title: Chief Operating Officer
leads.notes: COO with 18 years PM experience. Managed portfolios up to 44,000 units. CPM and ARM designations. Started as leasing specialist - understands on-site operations. Key decision-maker for amenities.
leads.approach: Formal proposal with data on amenity ROI and resident satisfaction

leads.name: Cary Cole
leads.title: VP of Operations
leads.notes: 30+ years in RE and multifamily PM. UT Austin accounting grad. Focuses on NOI maximization - position smart markets as revenue driver.
leads.approach: Revenue share pitch - show NOI impact of amenity upgrade

leads.name: Steven Parker
leads.title: President, Nevada
leads.units_managed: Thousands of HOA communities in Nevada
leads.notes: PRESIDENT of Nevada operations since 2012. TOP decision-maker for all FirstService Nevada. FirstService manages HOAs - different model but controls common areas where machines could go. BYU grad, Eagle Scout.
leads.approach: Executive-level meeting request, formal amenity proposal

leads.name: Lauren Starner
leads.title: Senior Vice President, Community & Lifestyle Services
leads.notes: SVP of Community & LIFESTYLE Services - literally manages amenities and lifestyle programs. PERFECT target for smart market placement. Marketing background = understands resident value proposition.
leads.approach: Frame as lifestyle/amenity upgrade, resident satisfaction data

leads.name: Michael Quagrello
leads.title: Senior Vice President, Community & Lifestyle Services
leads.notes: SVP Community & Lifestyle. 20+ years hospitality (managed 40 resorts across 8 states). UNLV hotel management. Hospitality mindset = understands guest/resident experience amenities.
leads.approach: Hospitality angle - premium amenity experience, data on similar deployments

leads.name: Jennifer Ballew
leads.title: Vice President of Community & Lifestyle Services
leads.notes: VP with PCAM, AMS, CMCA certifications. 20+ years experience. Licensed Supervising Community Manager in NV.
leads.approach: Professional association networking (IREM/CAI), then formal outreach

leads.name: Audra Hamernik
leads.title: Chief Executive Officer
leads.notes: CEO of Nevada's LARGEST nonprofit housing developer. $137M annual budget. 36 communities. Affordable housing = residents who NEED convenient, affordable refreshment options. 2022 Executive of the Year - Vegas Chamber.
leads.approach: Community impact angle - serving residents, affordable convenience. Vegas Chamber connection.

leads.name: Tim Veenstra
leads.title: Chief Operating Officer
leads.notes: COO - 20+ years affordable housing. Previously oversaw 23,000 public housing units at Chicago Housing Authority. Understands large-scale operations. Key operational decision-maker.
leads.approach: Operational efficiency pitch - hassle-free amenity that serves residents

leads.name: Waldon Swenson
leads.title: Vice President of Corporate Affairs
leads.notes: VP Corporate Affairs - communications and partnerships. Good first contact for proposals. NAIOP and Nevada Housing Coalition member.
leads.approach: Partnership/community impact proposal via corporate affairs channel

leads.name: Alison Burk
leads.title: Partner & Vice President of Development, Nevada
leads.notes: NEVADA-SPECIFIC partner since 2005. Extensive Las Vegas market knowledge. Handles affordable AND luxury multifamily. This is THE Fore Property Nevada decision-maker. 5,000+ units completed.
leads.approach: Pop-in at Nevada office, gift basket, development-stage pitch (install during build)

leads.name: Ellen Richwine
leads.title: President
leads.notes: President - asset management oversight. Started as Division Controller, advanced to President. Financial mindset = needs ROI data.
leads.approach: ROI-focused proposal with financial projections

leads.name: Jonathan Fore
leads.title: Managing Partner, Western Region
leads.notes: Managing Partner for Western Region including Las Vegas. USC Marshall grad. NMHC member. Development authority for West Coast.
leads.approach: NMHC networking, development-stage amenity pitch

leads.name: Jeanette Ivan
leads.title: Property Management Director
leads.notes: Referenced in testimonial as hands-on PM team leader. American Nevada manages Green Valley area commercial + multifamily. Greenspun family ownership = civic leaders. Goes 'above and beyond' per client testimonial.
leads.approach: Pop-in at Corporate Circle office in Henderson, gift basket

leads.name: Natalie Stagnitta
leads.title: Property Manager
leads.notes: Referenced alongside Jeanette Ivan in client testimonial. Hands-on PM. Henderson/Green Valley focus.
leads.approach: Pop-in with gift basket at Henderson office

leads.name: Mayra Rosales-Esquivel
leads.title: Regional Manager
leads.notes: Regional Manager - manages multiple properties directly. Good mid-level contact for initial pilot placement.
leads.approach: Pop-in at managed property with gift basket

leads.name: Kimmie Weber
leads.title: Regional Manager
leads.notes: Regional Manager at Stout. Mid-level PM contact.
leads.approach: Pop-in at managed property with gift basket

leads.name: Phyllis Garcia
leads.title: Director of LIHTC and Compliance
leads.notes: LIHTC compliance director - manages affordable housing requirements. Understands what amenities are allowed in tax credit properties. Important for affordable community placements.
leads.approach: Technical compliance discussion about smart market installations

leads.name: Cherise Quimby
leads.title: Vice President of Accounting
leads.notes: VP Accounting - controls vendor payments and contract approvals. Useful contact for rev share agreement processing.
leads.approach: After PM approval, coordinate with for contract/payment setup

leads.name: Joyce Winward
leads.title: Vice President of Community & Lifestyle Services
leads.units_managed: High-rise, large-scale, and single-family HOA communities
leads.notes: VP of Community & Lifestyle with 25+ years experience. Manages high-rise and large-scale communities. Regional Director since 2012. Mentors team of 30+ associates.
leads.approach: HOA amenity upgrade pitch - position as lifestyle enhancement

tier_1_targets: Rebecca Corey (Ovation) - VP of PM, 10K+ units, LOCAL
Alison Burk (Fore Property) - Nevada Partner, 5K+ units
Steven Parker (FirstService) - President NV, thousands of HOAs
approach_sequence: 2. Gift basket drop-off at Ovation, Stout, American Nevada offices
3. LinkedIn connect + personalized message to all CRITICAL/HIGH
4. Follow up with formal smart market proposal deck
5. Schedule pop-in visits to managed properties
7. Ask for referrals: 'Introduce me to 3 other buildings'

value_props: Zero cost to property - we provide and maintain everything
Revenue share opportunity (3-5% of gross after month 6)
Local operator - you can call me directly
3-5 year exclusive agreements protect your investment
